item.title: #en @ 1517192133702156288

item.title: #en @ 1517186871352348676
item.description:
#OTD in 2008, the @USGS announced that the Landsat archive would become free & open to everyone, shifting the paradigm of how remotely sensed data is used. The open archive sparked innovation and a greater understanding of global land changes.
https://t.co/FEFIieLBiy #opendata https://t.co/QbtOplODdq
